amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for renewals of expiring section 8 tenant-based annual contributions contracts by $1 billion.

action.text: Mr. Latham raised a point of order against the Nadler amendment (A019). Mr. Latham stated that the provisions of the Nadler amendment sought to provide for a net increase of budget authority in violation of Section 3(d)(3) of H. Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Nadler.
